entry.title: King Krule - You Heat Me Up, You Cool Me Down

media:group.media:title: King Krule - You Heat Me Up, You Cool Me Down
media:group.media:description:
Buy/stream "You Heat Me Up, You Cool Me Down" - https://kingkrule.ffm.to/youheatmeup
A film by Reuben Bastienne-Lewis Music by King Krule Additional footage by Charlotte Patmore Animation by Jack Marshall Colour grading by Daniel Levy

media:group.media:title: King Krule - Stoned Again (Live)
media:group.media:description:
Stoned Again (Live) taken from the forthcoming live album by King Krule ‘You Heat Me Up, You Cool Me Down’, out September 10th via XL Recordings/Matador Records.
Pre-order album: https://kingkrule.ffm.to/youheatmeup Follow King Krule: https://www.instagram.com/edgar_the_breathtaker
Filmed by Reuben Bastienne-Lewis Graded by Daniel Levy
Footage recorded at Paris L’Olympia with kind permission Special thanks to Alias Production

media:group.media:title: Hey World!
media:group.media:description:
A film by Charlotte Patmore & Archy Marshall
Directed by Charlotte Patmore Written by Archy Marshall Piano by Theo McCabe
https://kingkrule.net
TOUR DATES
March 3rd - Brussels - AB 4th - Paris - L'Olympia 5th - Amsterdam - Melkweg 7th - Copenhagen - KB Hallen 8th - Berlin - Columbiahalle 19th - Dublin - Olympia 21st - Glasgow - Barrowland 22nd - Manchester - Albert Hall 24th - London - Brixton Academy
April 2nd - Dallas, TX - House Of Blues 3rd - Houston, TX - White Oak Music Hall 4th - Austin, TX - Stubbs Waller Creek 7th - Los Angeles, CA - Palladium 8th - Oakland, CA - Fox Theatre 10th - Seattle, WA - Showbox SoDo 11th - Portland, OR - Roseland Theatre 14th - Minneapolis, MN - First Avenue 15th - Chicago, IL - Riviera Theatre 17th - Toronto, ON - Queen Elizabeth Theatre 18th - Montreal, QC - MTELUS 19th - Boston, MA - House Of Blues 21st - Philadelphia, PA - Union Transfer 22nd - Washington, DC - 9:30 Club 24th - Brooklyn, NY - Kings Theatre
